contest-event.event-date:
June 24, 1896 D Lofthouse in Cleveland Contest
Lofthouse in Cleveland Contest 10 Other Lofthouse in Cleveland Contest lofthouse-in-cleveland-contest
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Loftus-in-Cleveland 4 bands entered
Prizes: £9 and 7 guinea trombone, £7, £4
Source: The Yorkshire Herald, and The York Herald (York, England), Friday, June 26, 1896; pg. 6; Issue 14058.
Silver medal for best trombone player: Robert Jackson, Farnley Ironworks
Jan. 27, 2012, 6:48 p.m. March 31, 2013, 3:30 p.m.
1 Farnley Ironworks A. Blackburn
2 Eston Miners Charles Henry Kay
3 Falsgrave (Scarborough) Frank Auty
